workspaceScope.description: Scope of the workspace to create

workspaceName.description: Name of the workspace to create

description.description: A description of the workspace to create
description.default: This project was created by the genesis CLI

skipGitHub.description: Whether or not to skip generating a GitHub repository for this workspace

registry.description: URL of the registry to run the CLI against. Will use the registry for grabbing genesis and for genesis to grab dependencies

destination.description: Path to the destination dir where workspace will be created. When not provided, will generate workspace in default temporary E2E directory.

yarnCacheClean.description: Whether or not to clear the yarn cache before running install. Useful if installing local packages that change often during development.
